item.title: Login.java Error,
item.dc:creator: @Kids Kids_
item.description:
@Kids wrote:

Okay this is how it goes…

I downloaded Pur3scape and it didn’t come with Login.java or Stream.java.

I decompiled the Login.Java and the Stream.Java because the banned I.P’s wouldn’t load when I start the server… I need this or else theres no way of stopping nullers and I asked the creater he just said he didn’t know what I did wrong… So if you can please help.

item.title: Login.java Error,
item.dc:creator: @Kids Kids_
item.description:
@Kids wrote:

[code]Compiling all files…
a\net\com\espeon\io\login.java:3: class steam is public, should be declared in a filed named steam.java

public final class stream
^

1 error
press any key to continue …[/code]

First Few Lines Of Login.Java

[code]public final class Stream
{

public Stream(int i, int j)
{
    inOffset = 0;
    outOffset = 0;
    bitPosition = 0;
    frameStackPtr = -1;
    frameStackSize = 10;
    frameStack = new int[frameStackSize];[/code]

First Few Lines Of Stream.Java

[code]package net.com.espeon.util;

public final class Stream
{

public Stream(int i, int j)
{
    inOffset = 0;
    outOffset = 0;
    bitPosition = 0;
    frameStackPtr = -1;
    frameStackSize = 10;
    frameStack = new int[frameStackSize];
    inBuffer = new byte[i];
    outBuffer = new byte[j];
}

[/code]

If you know the error can you please re-write the Code and if you can explain what I did wrong here so it won’t happen again.

Read full topic
